content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage depot.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: [“out of fuel”]).
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: [“no ingredients to smelt”]).

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science pack(s) for research (status: NO_POWER; research: automation).
- Connected small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) forming an electricity network.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at positions 
(Boiler: -6.0, 24.5; Offshore Pump: -9.5, 24.5; Steam Engine: 2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for steam production (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: [“out of fuel”]); connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); currently linked with fluid_system=4924.
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction (status: WORKING; fluid_systems: [4924]).
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”]); connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Pipeline Network comprising multiple PipeGroups:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=4924 at approximately position(-6.5, 20.5) (status: WORKING) with a series of connected pipe segments.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=4925 at position(-2.5, 20.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=4926 at position(-0.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=4931 at position(-3.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=4930 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=4935 at position(3.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=4934 at position(2.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=4937 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY).
- Electricity Network: ElectricityGroup with id=1784 connecting poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

ERROR TIPS
──────────────────────
• PipeGroup Availability and Merge Failures:
  - Repeated connection attempts using fluid_system IDs [2172, 2215, 2258, 2301, 2344, 2387, 2430, 2473; 2516, 2559, 2602, 2645, 2688, 2731, 2774, 2817; 2860, 2903, 2946, 2989, 3032, 3075, 3118, 3161; 3204, 3247, 3290, 3333, 3376, 3419, 3462, 3505; 3548, 3591, 3634, 3677, 3720, 3763, 3806, 3849; 3892, 3935, 3978, 4021, 4064, 4107, 4150, 4193; 4236, 4279, 4322, 4365, 4408, 4451, 4494, 4537; and now 4580, 4623, 4666, 4709, 4752, 4795, 4838, 4881] indicate that no working PipeGroup was available during connection attempts. Confirm the operational readiness of PipeGroups and verify network stabilization before initiating further connections.

• Pipe Placement Obstructions:
  - Ensure that all target connection endpoints are unobstructed prior to attempting pipe placements.

• Multi‐Segment Pipeline Connection Challenges:
  - Verify that intermediate waypoints precisely align with both the source and target endpoints during multi‐segment pipeline connection setups.

• Steam Engine Connection Configuration:
  - Double-check the configuration of the steam engine’s fluid input, its connection points, and the status of nearby PipeGroups to resolve persistent connection issues.
